description:
Looking for a pickleball club near you? Maybe a swing coach to improve your game? Maybe you’re new to the city and want to join a volleyball league. Reclub is the app that’s powering the global sports community.

Use Reclub to:

DISCOVER. Find sports near you. Pick your city + sport to find other players who love the game as much as you do.
MEET. Make an activity. Play a round robin. Invite your friends to come to the court and join the fun.
RUN A CLUB. Club management made easy. Round robins, leagues and social drop-ins, all done in a few taps.
COMPETE. Setup pickleball tournaments. football competitions, or any other sport in a snap. Brackets, leagues and registration all in one place.
CHAT. Connect with the other athletes. Setup a drop-in with club members.

Terms of service: https://reclub.co/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://reclub.co/privacy

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle. 
-------------------------------------------------
AGREEMENT
https://dartcounter.net/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
https://dartcounter.net/privacy-policy

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Dartsmind provides auto-scoring using the device camera, online darts games with video, plenty of practice games and etc.
Device requirements for Auto-scoring:
● iPhone XS/XR or later iPhone models.
● iPad Pro 3rd Gen, iPad mini 5th Gen, iPad Air 3rd Gen, iPad 8th Gen, or later models.

Darts Games Provided:
- X01 (from 210 to 1501)
- Cricket Games: Standard Cricket, No Score Cricket, Tactic Cricket, Random Cricket, Cut-Throat Cricket
- Practice Games: Around the Clock, JDC Challenge, Catch 40, 9 Darts Double Out (121 / 81), 99 Darts at XX, Round the World, Bob’s 27, Random Checkout, 170,  Cricket Count Up, Count Up
- Party Games: Hammer Cricket, Half It, Killer, Shanghai, Bermuda, Gotcha

Key features:
- Auto-scoring using device camera.
- Support both iPhone and iPad, both portrait and landscape orientations.
- Play online darts games with your friends.
- Most Games Support up to 6 players.
- Provide detailed statistics for each game to help you to understand and improve your darts skill.
- Provide detailed game histories for each Leg and Match.
- Provide DartBot with different levels for X01 and Standard Cricket.
- Support Match Mode (legs format and sets format) for X01 and Standard Cricket.
- Provide lots of custom settings for each game.

Terms of Use:
https://www.dartsmind.com/index.php/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy:
https://www.dartsmind.com/index.php/privacy-policy/

Get the latest live football scores, results & fixtures from across the world, including World Cup & Leagues with Score8088 football live app.  All the football fixtures, latest results & live scores for all leagues and competitions.


Score808 - Fixtures provides live Football scores, lineups, stats, match events, live text commentary & social media content for Football matches.

Welcome to Winner, the best tournament manager and tournament organizer app.
With Winner, creating your dream tournament is just a few clicks away!
Try our tournament manager app now, it's free!

- Main Features -

- Fast tournament creation -
With Winner creating a tournament is fast and easy.
You can create multiple teams, multiple players or an entire match schedule with just a single click!

- Multiple sports types -
With Winner you can create a tournament for any sports type: 
football, soccer, basketball, tennis, cricket, ice hockey and many more.

- Multiple tournament formats -
With Winner setting your tournament format is easy.
You can choose from a predefined set of formats: league, cup, group stage, round robin, playoffs, series, knockout, single elimination bracket, double elimination bracket or create your own custom format.

- Match schedule -
With Winner you can create a match schedule for your tournament manually or randomly, and edit the match teams or players, date, time and location.

- Tournament sharing -
With Winner sharing your tournament is easy.
You can make your tournament public and let friends and family follow your tournament matches.

- Match events -
With Winner you can add events to your matches.
Goals, assists, penalty kicks, yellow cards, red cards and substitutions.

- Match venues -
With Winner you can set up your own match venues to host your tournament matches.

- Offline and online mode -
With Winner you can update your tournament from any place and at any time, even when you're offline!

- Customized logos for tournaments, teams and players (PRO) -
With Winner you can further customize your tournaments by setting custom logos and pictures for tournaments, teams, players and venues.

- Multiple admins -
With Winner you can set your tournament followers as admins. Admins can also update match results and help you manage your tournament easily.

- Winner PRO Auto-renewable Subscriptions -
Winner offers 3 different PRO subscriptions: 
• Bronze- 1 month (1.49$)
• Silver - 3 months (4.49$)
• Gold - 1 year (12.99$)

With Winner PRO you can: 
• Enjoy the app with no ads
• Create more tournaments, teams and players
• Customize the icons of tournaments, teams and players
• Edit the date, time and location of the matches

- Winner PRO Subscriptions Details - 
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Looking for a tournament manager app? A league or cup maker?
Winner is the app for you!

DUPR uses an innovative rating algorithm engineered to grow the sport of pickleball with a commitment to accuracy, transparency, and adaptability.


LOG MATCHES

Start increasing your rating today by registering and recording all your matches!
Log your recent matches. Once you’re done, your opponent will be prompted to verify scores via email.


GET YOUR DUPR
 
Your rating will be updated immediately once your scores are verified by your opponent 
You may review your match history at any time.
 

FIND PLAYERS NEARBY 

Browse DUPR user profiles - see the match history, ratings, and approximate location of potential opponents and teammates.

DUPR offers in-app subscriptions that provide exclusive features, an ad-free experience, and other benefits.

Dart Scores is the ultimate tool while playing darts for everyone from beginning enthusiasts to experienced professionals.

Dart Scores offers an impressive set of features in several areas: Player management, Darts scoreboard, Tournament planning and Training.

PLAYER MANAGEMENT
- Add players and/or remove any amount of players, completely free of charge
- Keep track of useful information like games player, games won, turns played and average score

DARTS SCOREBOARD
- Set up games with different sets, game types and players of your choice
- Supported game types: 101, 203, 301, 501, 701, Tactics and Cricket
- For quick play, the app always has a preset game ready to start with one tap
- Keep track of all scores in a game in a smooth and ergonomically designed scoreboard
- The app automatically switches turns and calculates who gets the first throw
- Manually switch turns by simply tapping on a players name
- Watch live statistics during the game through the 'Stats' button
- The app provides guidance for the best finish as soon as one is available

TOURNAMENT PLANNING
- The app can automatically organize tournaments with 4 and 8 participants
- By default, the 101, 201, 301, 501 and 701 game types are supported for tournaments

TRAINING
- Train your accuracy by aiming for several dart segments while the app measures the amount of time it takes you to hit the randomly selected segment. Available in easy and hard
- The app can provide you a random score from 1 to 180 and measures the amount of time it takes you to throw that score with maximum 3 darts
- Timed around the clock
- The app can unlimitedly repeat all segments on the dart board to keep you aiming for randomly selected segments for as long as you want, without interruption from the app.
- Training with multiple players

AVAILABLE UPGRADES
Dart Scores provides you with an impressive set of features completely free of charge, but also offers you the possibility to upgrade your darts experience through several upgrades

REMOVE ADS
- The app does not contain an annoying amount of ads to start with, but for those who want a complete ad-free experience, this upgrade can buy the ads out forever.

GAME UPGRADE
- Adds support for the 1001 Game Type
- Adds 1001 and Cricket support for tournaments
- Allows for up to 6 participants in a single game
- Allows players to play a 301, 501, 701 or 1001 game alone against BullBot
- Adds per dart scoring (on iPhone 5 and newer)
- Adds First To modus

DATA UPGRADE
- Allows you to view all stand-alone games played with custom players, and their scoreboards
- View charts of your statistics
- Pause x01 games
- Detailed insight in training statistics
- Data available as from version 4.4

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

﻿Welcome to our unique darts scorekeeping app! Our special feature is a virtual dartboard where you can enter your score by tapping directly on the dart fields. It's like having a real dartboard in the palm of your hand!

But that's just the beginning. With game modes including X01 (301/501), Cricket, and 8 party games, as well as local and online play modes, you'll have endless opportunities to compete and improve your skills. Plus, our app includes bots that allow you to practice against five different skill levels, making it the perfect tool for players of all experience levels.

MAIN FEATURES:
▪ 	Game modes: X01 (301/501), Cricket, and 8 party games
▪	Local mode: Supports unlimited amount of players
▪	Online mode: Play remotely with your friends and relatives
▪	Bots: Practice by playing against five differently skilled bots
▪	4 score input methods including a virtual dartboard
▪	Smart checkout helper for beginners or pros
▪	Voice recognition and speech output
▪	Player management with profile pictures
▪	Optimized X01 score view for connected screen via AirPlay
▪	Extensive statistics

ALL GAME MODES:
▪ 	X01 (301/501/701)
▪ 	Cricket
▪ 	Highscore
▪ 	Elimination
▪ 	Killer
▪ 	Shanghai
▪ 	Shooter
▪ 	Splitscore
▪ 	1 To 20
▪ 	Round the Clock

PRICING:
▪ 	First 7 days without ads
▪ 	Recommended: One time purchase for lifetime full access without ads
▪ 	Alternative: Free full access with ads

Tennis TV is the official live and on-demand online video streaming app of the ATP Tour. Stream live tennis on your favourite device from every ATP Tour tournament, as well as full match replays, classic matches, highlights and live scores as they update in real time. Watch 2,500 ATP singles and doubles matches each year from every ATP Masters 1000, ATP 500 and ATP 250 tournament, plus the Nitto ATP Finals and Next Gen ATP Finals presented by PIF.

Get a Premium subscription today and enjoy unlimited access to Tennis TV, including spoiler mode which hides scores and timelines at the tap of a button. Or, register a free account and enjoy a selection of highlights, hot shots and more.

Features:

* Live streams from over 55 ATP Tournaments a year, giving uninterrupted access to top-tier tennis throughout the season

* 2,500 live matches a year, each one available on demand within minutes

* Order of play featuring scores that update in real-time

* Hide timelines and scores with spoiler mode – never have a match ruined again

* Watch how you want with quick highlights, daily compilations, 10-minute match highlights, full-length replays and more

* Dive into over 35,000 hours of full match replays with the Tennis TV library. Enjoy classic matches dating back to 1990 featuring Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray, Andre Agassi, Pete Sampras and more

* Follow your favourite players and never miss a match

* All ATP Masters 1000s including the BNP Paribas Open, Miami Open presented by Itau, Mutua Madrid Open, Internazionali BNL d'Italia, National Bank Open Presented By Rogers and more

* All ATP 500s, ATP 250s plus the prestigious Nitto ATP Finals, Next Gen ATP Finals presented by PIF and the United Cup

Tennis TV Premium requires a paid subscription. All subscriptions auto-renew, but you can cancel anytime. If you purchase your subscription with in-app payment, you can manage this via your device settings.

My Dart Training, the training & darts scoreboard app for all darts players.
Training/Practice on a regular basis is important to improve your darts skills. But it is just as important to keep records of the trainings results. This job does My Dart Training for you.
Keep track with your progress in miscellaneous variants and bring your gameplay to the next level  by detecting your problems and optimizing your play. My Dart Training supports you in doing so.
My Dart Training is also a multiplayer darts scorer, for X01 games and many other darts games.

Currently available multiplayer games: 
* X01 Scoreboard (two input options- score or each dart,  no Player limitation)
   with the voice of Kirk Bevins
* Cricket ( no Player limitation)
* Highscore ( no Player limitation)
* Buetts Eleven
* Halve-It / Splitscore
* Killer
* Elimination
* Scoring
* RTW Scoring
* Cricket Scoring
 
Currently available training variants: 
* x01 (101, 170, 201, 301, 501, 701, 1001)
* scoring (100@)
* round the world / clock (options are singles, doubles or trebles)
* round the world scoring
* Challenge Mode (like a CPU Opponent)
* CPU Mode (15 different cpu levels or possibility to define opponent-strenght)
* Bob's 27
* Catch 40
* Highscore
* Finishing 50
* Game420
* Cricket (classic and scoring)
* Target Training
* Halve-It / Splitscore
* JDC Challenge
* A1 Drill (by George Silberzahn - Flightschool)
* Game 121
* Pristleys Triples
* Multiplayer Darts Scoreboard 
* Practice Guru 100
* Checkout Training

Functions:
* save and restore database from phone
* Profiles: use different Trainingsprofiles for different darts or setups and compare them

mScorecard is the ultimate golf scorecard, statistics and GPS app. It instantly calculates scores, handicaps, stableford points, sidegames, advanced round statistics and distances for multiple players.

mScorecard allows you to:

* Track strokes and putts along with fairway hits, greens in regulation, up-and-downs, sand saves and penalties for up to five players per round. Enter scores and shot details in a matter of seconds per hole.

* Store full game histories and advanced round statistics on your phone along with an unlimited number of courses, players and rounds. Or post them on our server for detailed analysis. 

* Use GPS to view your distance to the green at all times. 

* Calculate and track your handicap index automatically based on played rounds. mScorecard™ supports multiple handicap systems in different countries. 

* Analyze rounds and statistics to manage and improve your game. 

* Wager and play popular side games, including Skins, Nassau, Match Play, Stroke Play, Stableford, Greenies, Longest Drive, Birdies, Eagles. 

* Share scorecards and stats with your friends

mScorecard includes integration with Apple’s Health app.

mScorecard standard version is free of charge. We also provide an optional premium subscription that provides additional features. Subscription will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription length options are 1 month, 6 months or 12 months. It automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the original subscription fee. 
For more info you can read our Terms of Use: https:/www.mscorecard.com/terms.html

Welcome to MyLineups, the ultimate football lineup creator for fans, coaches, and players.

Bring your tactical ideas to life by effortlessly designing, customizing, and sharing football lineups.

• Custom Kits: Showcase your team’s identity by designing personalized kits. Choose from various colors, patterns, and styles to make your squad uniquely yours.
